title: how to request an account report card
body: hey everyone, i've been playing for quite a while now and i remember seeing before an option to request from riot a report card that holds a bunch of account stats like when i first joined and stuff like that. However, i've  totally forgotten where that request is in help and support. does anyone know it or have a link to it? thanks!

replies.body: Search for "Riot Games Privacy" and go to the privacy.riotgames link, log in, and press the "Looking for more?" button. From there, you'll see a list of instructions of how to get this information - it's not free, and it will take a while.
thanks so much! i remember there was a cost yeah i just had no idea where to look for it
hey! so i don’t know my account creation date, finding that link was my hope of getting/paying riot to tell me that :P is there another way or trick to find out that info?
That info isn't available anywhere since it's considered sensitive personal account information.
well that answers everything then! guess i’m not getting any other account info.{{sticker:sg-janna}}
